**Expected Extraction:**

- title: "Event-Sourced Architecture Patterns"

- source_type: "paper"
- summary: "Explores event sourcing patterns..."
- topics: ["architecture", "event-sourcing", "CQRS", "distributed-systems"]

**Entities:**

- author: "Dr. John Smith" → person entity
- publication: "Software Engineering Journal" → source entity

- ResearchNoteCreated: 2024-03-01T00:00:00Z

Use for testing research paper parsing and extraction of:
- Paper title
